TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void XsltMessageEncounteredEventHandler(object sender, XsltMessageEncounteredEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed XsltMessageEncounteredEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub XsltMessageEncounteredEventHandler(sender As Object, e As XsltMessageEncounteredEventArgs)
public delegate void XsltMessageEncounteredEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, XsltMessageEncounteredEventArgs ^ e);
type XsltMessageEncounteredEventHandler = delegate of obj * XsltMessageEncounteredEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: que contiene los datos del evento.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El evento tiene lugar durante el procesamiento cuando XSLT un `xsl:message` se especifica en la hoja de estilos.The event occurs during XSLT processing when an `xsl:message` is specified in the style sheet. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controlador de eventos, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
